summary: Defines abstract and concrete data containers that model primitive drawing elements (rectangular boxes, lines, text) for quantum pulse visualizations. Each object supplies a unique data key for identification, enabling plotter‑agnostic rendering, efficient visibility management, and backend‑independent updates.
business_intent: Provide a modular, testable representation of pulse diagram components that decouples the visualization logic from specific plotting libraries, allowing easy addition of new plotters and reliable unit testing of the visualization layer.
